page.title: 11CONSTRUCTION OF THE NEW A55
page.content: There's a lot of large machines like scrapers, bulldozers,cranes and trucks.They use these to build the road. Some of the machines are new; some of the workers are trained away but some are local. There are some foot-bridges to cross the new road.People from away are paying locals to clean the work base.They also pay them for bed and breakfast. Based on the site are the large construction companies like Costain, John Jones and Clwyd County Council. John Jones supplies the machines. They get all the stone they need from the local quarries. As there are a lot of old mine shafts in the area they need special machines like scrappers or rippers. They hope to complete the road by September 1986.
